channel.title: Okay i need help on a run.bat file
channel.description:
this is what i get each time i try to run my run files [code]
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.[/code]
this is my code for the run file
[Code]
@echo off title DeathScape Dementhium 639 java -server -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/* org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap pause [/code] can some one help with this please it should work but i do have jdk 1.7_10

item.title: Okay i need help on a run.bat file
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:11, topic:477116”][quote author=luna-scape link=topic=595310.msg4192084#msg4192084 date=1356977532]

Try this:

@echo off title DeathScape Dementhium 639 start java -server -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/* org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap pause

You’re hilarious.

OP set your Environment Variables (as Null Amount said)… Use this tool Lin made: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,375681.0.html

This always says the same to me till i add start for it

What? I don’t understand what you just said…

The run always gives that erfor to me if i don’t got start for it
[/quote]

That’s not the proper way to fix it. You have to set your EV.[/quote]

Ha okay but its just an quick fix for me when i want to check something but thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Okay i need help on a run.bat file

item.title: Okay i need help on a run.bat file
item.dc:creator: @jkicool jkicool
item.description:
@jkicool wrote:

[quote=“1airwolf, post:3, topic:477116”][quote author=shank beast link=topic=595310.msg4191853#msg4191853 date=1356922238]
Ahh, Where “java” is highlight and paste this

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_10\bin\java.exe”
[/quote]
1 i tryed that and 2 im running 64 bit os[/quote]If your java is not in “program files” it may be in your “program files x86”;All you got to do is redirect/edit the code.

Read full topic

What does running a 64 bit OS have to do with it? Set your environment variables.
